definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:baptised</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_xp_level"><value name="xpamount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.dispenser.fail</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:baptised</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
